item.title: The return of OMNI
item.description: I vividly remember reading Omni Magazine growing up, both in my local library and my high schoolâ€™s library. The mix of science writing and science fiction stories were fantastical and helped shape me for years to come. It was there I first encountered the writing of George R.R. Martin with his story Sandkings and other authors I would read as an adult. Glenn Fleishman wrote recently at Boing Boing about who owns the copyrights of the former magazine:
